snippet.title: Shards of Chaos | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
“Raising the blade over my dear friend, I could only curse this broken world with all my soul. Nothing to worry about... If my blade turns out to be the slower” Shards of fate, heart and soul.

• Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1725910/Shards_of_Chaos/
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/LeiOnoe
• VK: https://vk.com/vnshards

Planned Release Date: 2022 | Wishlist 💙

• OST: https://open.spotify.com/album/5DexdoFNdTRIB2jeISaeXQ

#visualnovel
